resources:
Stream This is the view for the playlists. My favorite UI for a music app is Tidal, and using the BlurredGridMenu would be a neat addition to give it a similiar look This is the view for individual tracks. Digging around in Android Arsenal I found something called Music Cover View that would provide a cool transition from a list of songs to a song Main page of the app for the user to choose what they would like to listen to. One important thing to do would be to add a dialog for permission to use the user's location. I found a tool called Simplify Permission from the Android Arsenal that could work with that issue. This layout plays a random song from area. The user has no choice in skipping it (kind of like the radio -but way better music). Also, this gif is supposed to move as the music plays. There is also a Audio Waves tool that moves along with the sound it hears. That could be more therapeutic This layout is for the locally available albums in the area> Spicy jalapeno bacon ipsum dolor amet spare ribs enim fugiat shankle jowl picanha.
